item.title: Khanji - Part 1
item.description: Hello Friends Once Again.ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ If you want to learn Khanji let’s learn together. Here I’ll be having my own Khanji class and teaching Khanji in a way that’ll be easy for yyou to understand. This will be a series so if you like the way I teach make sure you get subscribed by bookmarking this site. Enough talk let’s start. Khanji is one of the most hardest bits in Japanese language.
